Uses of Package
parallel.distributed

  • Packages that use parallel.distributed 
    Package Description
    analysis
    analysis package: a package implementing parallel algorithms for numerical differentiation and integration, and also including more complex transformations such as convolution.
    graph
    graph package: a collection of classes for representing graphs, hyper-graphs and algorithms operating on such discrete finite structures.
    graph.packing
    Optimization package that obtains near-optimal solution to the 1- and 2-packing combinatorial optimization problem.
    parallel.distributed
    Extends the basic functionality found in the parallel package over many remote JVMs distributed over a network of machines.
    popt4jlib
    popt4jlib: a parallel optimization library for Java.
    popt4jlib.BH
    Generalized Adaptive Basin Hopping
    popt4jlib.DE
    Differential Evolution Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.GA
    Genetic Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.GradientDescent
    Gradient-Descent Type Algorithms Parallel Implementation (suitable for real vector function optimization).
    popt4jlib.PS
    Particle Swarm Optimization Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.PS.FA
    Firefly Algorithm Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.neural
    Neural Network Related Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    tests.sic.rnqt.nbin
    tests.sic.rnqt.nbin package: implements exact and/or heuristic algorithms for the global optimization of long-run expected average costs of a single-echelon inventory control system operating a periodic review control policy (R,nQ,T) facing stochastic demands that are distributed according to the Negative Binomial distribution (a compound Poisson distribution where customers arrive at intervals that are spaced according to the Poisson distribution, but their order quantities are logarithmically distributed instead of being always single unit demands) in a continuous time cost-accounting setting.
    tests.sic.rnqt.norm
    tests.sic.rnqt.norm package: implements exact and/or heuristic algorithms for the global optimization of long-run expected average costs of a single-echelon inventory control system operating a periodic review control policy (R,nQ,T) facing normally distributed demands in a continuous time cost-accounting setting.
    tests.sic.sST.poisson
    tests.sic.sST.poisson package: implements exact and/or heuristic algorithms for the global optimization of long-run expected average costs of a single-echelon inventory control system operating a periodic review control policy (s,S,T) facing Poisson distributed demands in a continuous time cost-accounting setting.
    utils
    utils package: containing useful classes and methods including I/O manipulation.
  • Classes in parallel.distributed used by analysis 
    Class and Description
    PDBatchTaskExecutor
    Class implements thread-pooling to allow its users to execute concurrently a batch of tasks implementing the TaskObject interface.
  • Classes in parallel.distributed used by graph 
    Class and Description
    OKReplyRequestedPDBTExecWrkInitCmd
    empty (marker class).
    PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv
    Server class allows clients or workers to connect to this process and submit TaskObjects for processing to any of the available workers in the network of connected workers.
    PDBTExecCmd
    command for PDBTExecInited[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects.
    PDBTExecInitedClt
    thread-safe class implements the "Client" for networks of PDBTExecInitedWrk workers.
    RRObject
    auxiliary base-class wrapping up Requests/Results for TaskObjects processing.
  • Classes in parallel.distributed used by graph.packing 
    Class and Description
    DConditionCounterLLCClt
    Same functionality as DConditionCounter[Clt|Srv] classes, but use long-lived connections, for clients that call frequently incr/decr ops.
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorException
    indicates an exception in the execution of a task collection in a remote PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutor[Wrk].
    PDAsynchInitCmd
    empty abstract class extends RRObject.
    PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv
    Server class allows clients or workers to connect to this process and submit TaskObjects for processing to any of the available workers in the network of connected workers.
    RRObject
    auxiliary base-class wrapping up Requests/Results for TaskObjects processing.
  • Classes in parallel.distributed used by parallel.distributed 
    Class and Description
    DAccessHashtable
    Implements a shared-memory-type hash-table that allows for distributed JVM process clients to access a hash-table for get/put functionality.
    DAccMsg
    DAccMsg objects are meant to transport over Socket wires number accumulation requests (accumulate-data or get[Min/Max/Sum...] requests).
    DAccumulatorClt.AsynchUpdateThread
    auxiliary thread class is responsible for opening a connection to the DAccumulatorSrv's notification-port, and listening for incoming numbers representing new (min or max) incumbents.
    DAccumulatorNotificationType
    Helper class that DAccumulatorClt clients use to subscribe their interest to a DAccumulatorSrv object about receiving updates when new max or min values are sent to the server.
    DAccumulatorSrv
    class implements a server for distributed data accumulation functionality.
    DAccumulatorSrv.NotificationsServerThread
    auxiliary inner-class that handles notifications to interested clients of
    DActiveMsgPassingCoordinatorLongLivedConnClt
    class implementing clients for message-passing between threads living in distributed JVMs.
    DConditionCounter
    wrapper singleton class for ConditionCounter objects.
    DLock
    implements a distributed lock, valid across JVMs and across multiple threads in each JVM.
    DMsgIntf
    DMsgIntf objects are meant to transport over Socket wires sendData() and/or recvData() requests, as those are defined in the parallel.MsgPassingCoordinator class, which is in fact the class used to "transfer" message data between the threads in the parallel.distributed.DMsgPassingCoordinatorSrv class.
    DMsgPassingCoordinatorClt
    class implementing clients for message-passing between threads living in distributed JVMs.
    FwdSrv.SocketIOS
    auxiliary inner-class representing a data-structure holding a socket and its associated i/o streams.
    GraphDiameterEvalTask
    auxiliary class implementing TaskObject interface, not part of the public API.
    OKReply
    indicates an "OK" response to a previous request.
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorClt
    class implements the "Client" for networks of PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorWrk workers attached to PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorSrv servers (managers really), as a Singleton.
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorException
    indicates an exception in the execution of a task collection in a remote PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutor[Wrk].
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorSrv
    Server class allows clients or workers to connect to this process and submit TaskObjects for asynchronous processing to any of the available workers in the network of connected workers.
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorSrv.PDAsynchBTEWListener
    auxiliary inner class.
    PDAsynchInitCmd
    empty abstract class extends RRObject.
    PDBatchTaskExecutor
    Class implements thread-pooling to allow its users to execute concurrently a batch of tasks implementing the TaskObject interface.
    PDBatchTaskExecutor.PDBTEThread
    auxiliary class for PDBatchTaskExecutor, implementing the threads in the executor's thread-pool.
    PDBatchTaskExecutorClt
    class implements the "Client" for networks of PDBatchTaskExecutorWrk workers.
    PDBatchTaskExecutorException
    indicates an exception in the execution of a task collection in a remote PDBatchTaskExecutor[Wrk].
    PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv
    Server class allows clients or workers to connect to this process and submit TaskObjects for processing to any of the available workers in the network of connected workers.
    PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv.PDBTEWListener
    auxiliary inner class.
    PDBTExecCmd
    command for PDBTExecInited[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects.
    PDBTExecInitedClt
    thread-safe class implements the "Client" for networks of PDBTExecInitedWrk workers.
    PDBTExecInitedCltTest.TNLEvalTask
    auxiliary inner class implementing TaskObject interface, by means of evaluating the tests.TridNonlinearFunction at a given vector.
    PDBTExecInitedCltTest2.IdEvalTask
    auxiliary inner class implementing TaskObject interface, by means of returning its constructor argument.
    PDBTExecInitedSrv.PDBTEW2Listener
    auxiliary inner class.
    PDBTExecSingleCltWrkInitSrv
    class extends the PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv class to allow a load-balancing distributed computing architecture, whereby a server object of this class can only have a single client connected to it, and no other known servers connected to it at all.
    PDBTExecSingleCltWrkInitSrv.PDBTEW2Listener
    auxiliary inner class.
    RRObject
    auxiliary base-class wrapping up Requests/Results for TaskObjects processing.
    TaskObjectsAsynchExecutionRequest
    auxiliary class wrapping a request for processing asynchronously TaskObjects, in networks of PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutor[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects.
    TaskObjectsExecutionRequest
    auxiliary class wrapping a request for processing TaskObjects in networks of PDBatchTaskExecutor[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects.
    TaskObjectsExecutionResults
    auxiliary class wrapping the results of processing a TaskObject[].
    TNLAsynchEvalTask
    auxiliary class implementing TaskObject interface, by means of evaluating the tests.TridNonlinearFunction at a given vector.
    TNLEvalTask
    auxiliary class implementing TaskObject interface, by means of evaluating the tests.TridNonlinearFunction at a given vector.
